data.name: The Lands of Eldyn
data.detailed_description:
All that remains are warring factions. Will you unite the lands as one or will you venture into its depths to find out what befell these lands?

Eldyn is a dark, medieval hack and slash MMO where you conquer territory from other players, rebels and dark evils to gain Valor, unlocking new abilities and powers along the way.

Start with a spear, rations and buckler and work your way up to unlock a vast array of varied items, equipment and abilities to give you a strategic edge against your enemies.

Gameplay


  • Open world combat with up to 80 players per world
  • Free to play
  • Hack and slash combat
  • Coop play with up to 9 others
  • Boss battles
  • Command-able armies to lay siege to difficult forts
  • Wide range of items, equipment and abilities to unlock to create unique builds

data.short_description: Eldyn is a dark, medieval hack and slash MMO where you conquer territory from other players to gain Valor, unlocking new abilities and powers along the way. Team up with friends for a massively coop experience or fight it out against other players.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720 minimum resolution, OpenGL 2.0 Support, and recommended dedicated graphics card with 128 MB of RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080 resolution, OpenGL 2.0 Support, and recommended dedicated graphics card with 256 MB of RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
